rules_text:
Flying
[i]Soul Contract[/i] – At the beginning of each players upkeep, that player may discard a card. If they do, they strike a deal. If you own Capitalis and have no ongoing deal, strike a deal.
Partner with Atheis, Bearer of Thesis [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Atheis into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
